## Training materials for applied epidemiology and public health {.unnumbered}

**This website :**

-   Serve as a home for Applied Epi^TM^ training materials\
-   Provide problem-based teaching to address common epidemiological
    challenges\
-   Assist epidemiologists transitioning to R\
-   Be accessible in settings with low internet-connectivity via offline
    versions

## About Applied Epi {.unnumbered}

[**Applied Epi**](http://www.appliedepi.org) is a nonprofit
organization and grassroots movement that provides tools, training, and support to frontline epidemiologists and public health practitioners around the world. Your encouragement and feedback is most welcome:

-   Visit our [**main website**](http://www.appliedepi.org) and [**join our
    contact list**](https://forms.gle/9awNd8syypTSYUsn7)\
-   Email
    [**contact\@appliedepi.org**](mailto:contact@appliedepi.org){.email}\
-   Tweet [**\@epiRhandbook**](https://twitter.com/epirhandbook) or
    [**\@appliedepi**](https://twitter.com/appliedepi)
-   Submit issues to our [**Github
    repository**](https://github.com/appliedepi/applied_epi_training)
